resources.string: Scan the Qr code to start planning travel
\nThe Eiffel Tower is an iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris. The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited paid monument in the world. Wiki

\nThe Louvre Museum is one of the world largest museums and a historic monument. A central landmark of Paris. Nearly 35000 objects from prehistory to the 21st century are exhibited over an area of 60600 square metres. The Louvre is the world most visited museum. Wiki
\nAddress: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris
\nOpening hours: 9am to 6pm Closed on Tuesdays. More
